mathematica: nmax = 11; t[0, 0] = 1; t[0, k_] = 0; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = k*t[n-1, k-1] + (k+1)*t[n-1, k+1]; Flatten[ Table[ t[n, k-1], {n, 0, nmax}, {k, Mod[n, 2]+1, n+1, 2}]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 08 2011 *)
